contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xəlfələr |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Davachi Rayon|Davachi]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total =400 |population_footnotes ={{citation needed|date=October 2010}} |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=41 |latm=10 |lats=30 |latNS=N |longd=48|longm=53 |longs=13 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xəlfələr''' (also, '''Khalfalar''') is a village and municipality in the [[Davachi Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. It has a population of 400. The municipality consists of the villages of Xəlfələr and [[Yeləkəsən]].<ref>[http://www.belediyye.org/index.php?con=qanun&bkod=3637 Belediyye Informasiya Sistemi] {{dead link|date=January 2013}}</ref> == References == {{Reflist}} *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150B623774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Davachi Rayon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xelfeler, Davachi}} [[Category:Populated places in Shabran District]] {{Davachi-geo-stub}}
